formattedAddress: 2376 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10030, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2376 Adam Clayton Powell Jr Blvd 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10030, USA

originalText.text:
One of the greatest experiences I've had at a salon! The most kind and professional people work here. I was instantly welcomed and felt so at home. Like many, I've been looking for a salon in Harlem that specializes in black hair but keep unfortunately having less than good experiences. This location exceeded all expectations. The stylists went above and beyond to make me feel comfortable and assist with any of my questions and even recommended some amazing products! They were all knowledgeable and made me feel at ease.
I believe their prices to be fair, and the process of booking a service was seamless. If you are even questioning giving them a try, don't hesitate! They will get you right, leaving fresh and satisfied. This may be my new favorite salon in Harlem.

originalText.text:
tldr: I've been a loyal customer at Renaissance Curls for quite some time now, and I can confidently say that it's the only salon I trust when it comes to straightening my natural curly hair.

From the moment I walked in, I could tell that this salon truly cares about the health of their clients' hair. What sets Renaissance Curls apart is their exceptional ability to leverage various tools and techniques to minimize the amount of heat used during the straightening process. They understand the importance of maintaining hair health, and it shows in their approach.

Not only do they use heat-minimizing techniques, but they also employ efficient products and tools that are both effective and gentle on the hair. It's evident that they stay up-to-date with the latest industry innovations, ensuring that clients like me get the best possible results.

What I appreciate most is the consistency in their service. Over time, almost everyone at the salon has had a hand in styling my hair, and I've never left unsatisfied. Whether it's a regular maintenance appointment or a special occasion, I know I can rely on Renaissance Curls for a flawless finish every time.

If you're like me, someone who values not just a sleek look but also the health of your hair, I recommend Renaissance Curls. They've earned my trust with their expertise, dedication, and commitment to client satisfaction. Thank you, Renaissance Curls for always making me feel fabulous and keeping my hair healthy!

originalText.text: I've been here before and the service is excellent! This time, I got my son's hair washed, trimmed, and twisted for the summer. They were patient, gentle, and completed his hair in less time than expected. The appointment went so well that my Mom scheduled a time for herself next month. Our family will be returning for more natural hair experiences. Thank you, Renaissance Curls!

text.text: I've been here before and the service is excellent! This time, I got my son's hair washed, trimmed, and twisted for the summer. They were patient, gentle, and completed his hair in less time than expected. The appointment went so well that my Mom scheduled a time for herself next month. Our family will be returning for more natural hair experiences. Thank you, Renaissance Curls!

originalText.text:
I went here a while ago and definitely thought that the staff were professional and friendly.

However, I did not feel like I left with any information on how to care for my hair as a whole — which was primarily why I chose to come here and invest in my hair care.

My wash and go lasted two days - though I followed their instructions in wrapping it.

It was frizzy** and my stylist stopped communicating with me after I sat in the dryer. So when the dryer was done, I sat there confused for a while — unsure of what to do or where she went.

The owner was kind enough to finish up my hair for me, though.

**I must note that as a new natural at the time, I thought the wash and go I got was standard...that was until I went to another natural hair salon recently and compared the photos and realized my hair did not come out as great as I thought.

That is why I am writing this review now.

The photo with the emoji was my day 1 wash and go at Ren curls. The photo with my hair from the back was my recent experience at another salon.

originalText.text: An incredible salon with a clean, calming atmosphere, professional and kind stylists, and immaculate service. My curls have never looked this good. I thoroughly enjoyed my first visit to the salon and have every intention of returning.
